identifier.title: identifier
identifier.description: Unique Identifier For Each Sample. The same identifier is used for each assembly because within the scope of the original ARGOS study, each sample only have one associated assembly.

isolation_provider_name.title: isolation provider name
isolation_provider_name.description: Name of the provider from which the biological sample was derived.

email.title: email
email.description: Email obtained from the BioSample submission page.

submitting_organization.title: submitting organization
submitting_organization.description: Name of organization that is submitting the BioSample.

department.title: department
department.description: Name of department that is submitting the BioSample.

street.title: street
street.description: Street name of the organization submitting the BioSample.

city.title: city
city.description: City name of the organization submitting the BioSample.

state/province.title: state/province
state/province.description: State or province of the organization submitting the BioSample.

postal_code.title: postal code
postal_code.description: Postal Code of the organization submitting the BioSample.

country.title: country
country.description: Country name of the organization submitting the BioSample.

sample_name.title: sample name
sample_name.description: Name of the sample given by the submitter of the BioSample.

organism.title: organism
organism.description: Name of the expected organism. This is determined prior to sequencing.

strain.title: strain
strain.description: Strain name of the organism of interest.

collection_date.title: collection date
collection_date.description: The date on which the sample was collected.

isolation_source.title: isolation source
isolation_source.description: Describes the physical, environmental and/or local geographical source of the biological sample from which the sample was derived.

host.title: host
host.description: The natural host to the organism from which the sample was obtained.

lineage.title: cov_lineage
lineage.description: The Pango nomenclature is being used by researchers and public health agencies worldwide to track the transmission and spread of SARS-CoV-2, including variants of concern. This website documents all current Pango lineages and their spread, as well as various software tools which can be used by researchers to perform analyses on SARS-COV-2 sequence data. https://cov-lineages.org/index.html#about

isolate.title: isolate
isolate.description: Identification or description of the specific individual from which this sample was obtained.

sample_type.title: sample type
sample_type.description: Type of sample used for the BioSample submission.

ncbi_taxonomy_id.title: ncbi taxonomy identifier
ncbi_taxonomy_id.description: NCBI taxonomy ID of the organism.

contact_name.title: contact name
contact_name.description: Contact name associated with the BioSample.

clinical/environmental.title: clinical/environmental
clinical/environmental.description: Additional metadata on the use of this BioSample.

gisaid_accession.title: GISAID accession
gisaid_accession.description: The GISAID accession assigned to the sequence. GISAID Accession Numbers are used as unique and permanent identifiers for each virus beginning with the letters EPI and followed by numbers, to identify viruses and or/ segments.

gisaid_virus_name.title: GISAID virus name
gisaid_virus_name.description: The full virus name submitted to GISAID.

biomaterial_provider.title: biomaterial provider
biomaterial_provider.description: Name and address of the lab or PI, or a culture collection identifier.

disease.title: Disease
disease.description: List of diseases diagnosed; can include multiple diagnoses.

host_taxid.title: host taxonomy ID
host_taxid.description: NCBI taxonomy ID of the host.
